entry.title: Released 2.1.0
entry.summary: Today we're announcing version 2.1.0 of Rematch. More or less 4 months passed since we opened the Roadmap for version 2.1.0. Here we are writing this post telling you guys all the incredible improvements and features we introduced to this new version of Rematch.

entry.title: Welcome to Rematch blog
entry.summary: I'm super happy to announce that the new website is the continuation of the work that all of us who collaborate in Rematch have done altruistically because we love it.
